description: Main source file for the Flutter-based finance tracking application. It sets up the app's theme, navigation, authentication flow, core screens (Dashboard, Transactions, Budgets, Charts), and integrates various widgets and services essential for app operation.

classes.name: FinanceTrackerApp
classes.description: Root widget establishing the dark theme and navigation for the app.

classes.name: AuthNavigation
classes.description: Manages route switching between authentication screens and main app UI based on user authentication state.

classes.name: _AuthNavigationState
classes.description: State handler for AuthNavigation, checks authentication status, and manages navigation flow.

classes.name: MainScaffold
classes.description: Main application scaffold with bottom navigation between different core screens.

classes.name: _MainScaffoldState
classes.description: State handler for the main scaffold, managing current tab and navigation.

classes.name: LoginScreen
classes.description: UI for user login, integrating with auth service.

classes.name: _LoginScreenState
classes.description: State handler for login form, manages login process and UI updates.

classes.name: RegisterScreen
classes.description: UI for user registration, with form validation and integration with auth service.

classes.name: _RegisterScreenState
classes.description: State handler for registration process and UI.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Displays recent transactions and navigation to transaction creation/editing.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: Handles fetching and displaying recent transactions in dashboard view.

classes.name: TransactionsScreen
classes.description: Main transactions list view with CRUD options and refresh functionality.

classes.name: _TransactionsScreenState
classes.description: Manages transaction list state, deletion, and navigation to add/edit screens.

classes.name: TransactionEditScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing individual transactions.

classes.name: _TransactionEditScreenState
classes.description: Handles transaction form validation, submission, and date selection.

classes.name: BudgetsScreen
classes.description: Displays category budgets and their statuses.

classes.name: _BudgetsScreenState
classes.description: Fetches and displays budgets, manages refresh.

classes.name: ChartsScreen
classes.description: Shows visual analytics and spending breakdown charts.

classes.name: _ChartsScreenState
classes.description: Fetches analytics data and renders charts and explanatory UI.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter app, initializes and runs the root widget.

methods.name: _checkAuth
methods.description: Checks authentication status upon app start; updates UI accordingly.

methods.name: _onAuthenticated
methods.description: Callback upon successful login, triggers auth state update.

methods.name: _onSwitchToLogin
methods.description: Switches auth screen back to login.

methods.name: _onLogout
methods.description: Logs out user via AuthService and resets auth state.

methods.name: _fetchRecent
methods.description: Fetches recent transactions for dashboard display.

methods.name: _fetchTransactions
methods.description: Fetches the full list of transactions for transactions tab.

methods.name: _deleteTx
methods.description: Confirms and deletes a transaction by ID.

methods.name: _pickDate
methods.description: Opens date picker dialog; updates selected date.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Validates and submits new or edited transaction.

methods.name: _fetchBudgets
methods.description: Fetches budget data for the budgets tab.

methods.name: _fetchAnalytics
methods.description: Loads analytics data for charts overview.
